title: Nigeria: Afolayan is Air France Ambassador
text:
Liberia: China Downplays Corruption Here 
Afolayan also informed that he will be on location next month, to begin work on 'The CEO' with top Anglophone and Francophone stars from Nigeria, Morocco, Ivory Coast, Kenya and South Africa. 
The partnership includes Air France flying the cast and crew round these countries where the film will be shot, as well as showcasing previous works of the filmmaker on their in-flight entertainment. 
Jean-Raoul Tauzin, General Manager, Air France/KLM, said the company was proud to have Afolayan join the family as brand ambassador. 
"We are very convinced that with the help of Kunle Afolayan, we will be able also to develop as much as we can, a partnership between Air France and Nollywood in Nigeria," Tauzin said in a statement. 
Commercial Director, Air France/KLM, Arthur Dieffenthaler, who signed the MoU with Afolayan recalled that they first met at the Nollywood Paris Film Festival earlier this year, and that he was wowed by the filmmaker's attainment in the Nigerian film industry and the international scene. 
"After discussing about his movie and possible business partnership, I could see that there was a connection," Dieffenthaler said. Nigeria
